p: Medicinal plants and natural products are of potential importance in several age-related disorders, including memory impairment and dementia (Tewari et al., 2018). In this research topic Dimpfel et al. assessed the biological activity of some commercial extracts of the underground parts of Rhodiola rosea L. and its analytical markers, salidroside and rosavin, using long-term potentiation of synaptic transmission in hippocampus slices (a synaptic model of memory).
